name: summary
description: deixei.com :: Adds a markdown summary to your CI/CD
author: Marcio Parente da Silva

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Summary Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a summary title. Example: Notes for build $(Build.DefinitionName) or Notes for Release $(Release.DefinitionName)

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a overall description. Example: **Build Number**  : $(Build.BuildNumber) or **Release Id**  : $(Release.DefinitionId)

inputs.name: workingDir
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Enter the working directory in which to create the markdown summary. If no value is entered, the root will be used.
